trans-unit.source: Represents an elliptical arc between two points.
trans-unit.target: 表示兩個點之間的橢圓形弧線。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to store <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>儲存物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>物件和其他區段。

trans-unit.source: An elliptical arc is defined by its start and end points, x- and y-radius, x-axis rotation factor, a value indicating whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees, and a value describing the direction in which the arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 由其開始和結束點，而 x 和 y 半徑，x 軸旋轉的因素，值，指出弧形是否應大於 180 度，以及描述用來繪製弧形方向的值所定義的橢圓形弧線。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class does not contain a property for the starting point of the arc; it only defines the destination point of the arc it represents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>類別不包含弧線的起點的內容，只會定義它所代表之弧線的目的地點。

trans-unit.source: The beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: 弧線的起點是目前的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>加入。

trans-unit.source: The following illustrations demonstrate the different end point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 下圖示範不同的結束點， <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 Point 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "具有不同 Point 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 Size 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "具有不同 Size 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: IsLargeArc and SweepDirection
trans-unit.target: IsLargeArc 和 SweepDirection

trans-unit.source: For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> properties indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: 大多數的特定位置、 大小和輪替弧形，有四個不同弧形可以繪製。<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>屬性會指出要使用哪些弧線。

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。

trans-unit.source: The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>.
trans-unit.target: 其餘的兩個弧形候選項目每個繪製以不同的方向：<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> property specifies which one to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>屬性會指定要使用哪一個。

trans-unit.source: The following illustrations show different <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings
trans-unit.target: 具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 ArcSegment 物件

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings
trans-unit.target: 具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 ArcSegment 物件

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>是一種<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>類別會定義只弧線它所代表的目的地點; 弧線的起點是目前的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>至其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>加入。

trans-unit.source: For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: 對於最橢圓形弧線的特定位置、 大小和輪替有四個不同弧線要繪製;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`參數指出要使用哪些弧線。

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。

trans-unit.source: If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 如果`largeArc`是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果`largeArc`是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>, the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepDirection`是<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>，以正角方向繪製弧形。

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>, the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepDirection`是<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>，以負角方向繪製弧形。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>類別會定義只弧線它所代表的目的地點; 弧線的起點是目前的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>至其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>加入。

trans-unit.source: For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: 對於最橢圓形弧線的特定位置、 大小和輪替有四個不同弧線要繪製;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`參數指出要使用哪些弧線。

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。

trans-unit.source: If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 如果`largeArc`是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果`largeArc`是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>, the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepDirection`是<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>，以正角方向繪製弧形。

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>, the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepDirection`是<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>，以負角方向繪製弧形。

trans-unit.source: The destination point of the arc; the start point of the arc is defined as the current point of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> is added.
trans-unit.target: 弧線的終點。弧線的起點定義為加入了 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 目前的點。

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-radius of the arc. The x-radius is specified by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> property, and the y-radius is specified by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 弧線的半徑 X 和 Y。<see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> 屬性指定半徑 X，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> 屬性指定半徑 Y。

trans-unit.source: The x-axis rotation of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 橢圓形繞 X 軸旋轉。

trans-unit.source: Whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 弧線是否應該大於 180 度。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise" /> to draw the arc in a positive angle direction; set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise" /> to draw the arc in a negative angle direction.
trans-unit.target: 設為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise" /> 以正角方向繪製弧線，設為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise" /> 以負角方向繪製弧線。

trans-unit.source: Set to <c>true</c> to stroke the arc when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <c>false</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> 呈現區段時，設為 <c>true</c> 繪製弧線；否則為 <c>false</c>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>類別會定義只弧線它所代表的目的地點; 弧線的起點是目前的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>至其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>加入。

trans-unit.source: For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: 對於最橢圓形弧線的特定位置、 大小和輪替有四個不同弧線要繪製;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`參數指出要使用哪些弧線。

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。

trans-unit.source: If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 如果`largeArc`是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果`largeArc`是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>, the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepDirection`是<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>，以正角方向繪製弧形。

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>, the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepDirection`是<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>，以負角方向繪製弧形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出弧形是否應大於 180 度。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the arc should be greater than 180 degrees; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果弧形應大於 180 度，否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> properties indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: 大多數的特定位置、 大小和輪替弧形，有四個不同弧形可以繪製。<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>屬性會指出要使用哪些弧線。

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。

trans-unit.source: The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>.
trans-unit.target: 其餘的兩個弧形候選項目每個繪製以不同的方向：<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> property specifies which one to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>屬性會指定要使用哪一個。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示完全相同，除了兩個橢圓形弧線其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings
trans-unit.target: 具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 ArcSegment 物件

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the endpoint of the elliptical arc.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定橢圓形弧線的端點。

trans-unit.source: The point to which the arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 弧線要繪製到的點。

trans-unit.source: The default value is (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 (0,0)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>類別會定義只弧線它所代表的目的地點; 弧線的起點是目前的點<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>加入。

trans-unit.source: If the arc segment's start point and end point are the same, no arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果圓弧線段的起點和終點是相同的就會不繪製任何弧形。

trans-unit.source: For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> properties indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: 大多數的特定位置、 大小和輪替弧形，有四個不同弧形可以繪製。<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>屬性會指出要使用哪些弧線。

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。

trans-unit.source: The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>.
trans-unit.target: 其餘的兩個弧形候選項目每個繪製以不同的方向：<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> property specifies which one to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>屬性會指定要使用哪一個。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示完全相同，除了的數個橢圓形弧線其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 Point 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "具有不同 Point 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: Several ArcSegment objects with different Point settings
trans-unit.target: 數個具有不同 Point 設定的 ArcSegment 物件

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定橢圓形繞著 X 軸旋轉的量 (以度為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 橢圓形繞著 X 軸旋轉的量 (以度為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示完全相同，除了的數個橢圓形弧線其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: Several ArcSegment objects with different RotationAngle settings
trans-unit.target: 數個具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 ArcSegment 物件

trans-unit.source: Note that, if the arc's width and height are the same, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，是否弧線的寬度和高度都相同，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x- and y-radius of the arc as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構取得或設定弧形的 X 半徑和 Y 半徑。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure that describes the x- and y-radius of the elliptical arc. The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> property specifies the arc's x-radius; its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> property specifies the arc's y-radius.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />結構描述橢圓形弧線 x 和 y 半徑。<see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />結構的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" />屬性指定弧線的 x 軸半徑，其<see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" />屬性指定弧線的 y 半徑。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0,0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0,0。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示完全相同，除了的數個橢圓形弧線其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 Size 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "具有不同 Size 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: Several ArcSegment objects with different Size settings
trans-unit.target: 數個具有不同 Size 設定的 ArcSegment 物件

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the arc is drawn in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise" /> direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是以 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise" /> 方向繪製弧形。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the direction in which the arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 指定繪製弧形方向的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise" />。

trans-unit.source: For an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> with a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>, start point, and end <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>, four different arcs are possible.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>與給定<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>，開始點和結束<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>，可能會有四個不同的弧形。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> property reduces the number of possible arcs to two: an arc drawn from the start point to the end <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A> in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise> direction and an arc drawn from the start point to the end point in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise> direction.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>屬性減少可能都有兩個： 結尾從起始點繪製弧形<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Clockwise>方向和結束點，在從起始點繪製弧形<xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection.Counterclockwise>方向。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示完全相同，除了兩個橢圓形弧線其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings")
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 Arcsegment")

trans-unit.source: ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings
trans-unit.target: 具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 ArcSegment 物件
